inclusion.criterion: pregnant or post partum women with systolic blood pressure ≥160mm of Hg or diastolic BP ≥110 mm Hg
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: pacing device in place or any type of cardiac arrhythmia
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has carotid bruits and significant bilateral carotid stenosis, but no history of syncope or severe hypertension. He is being evaluated for PVD.
